author: ehatcher
msg: #23505 - Hani's patch to fix RussianAnalyzer test

author: dmitrys
msg: Implementation of compound files. This reduces the number of files
used by Lucene to 1 per index segment (2 when deleted documents exist).
Test cases modified and added to go with this code.

author: dmitrys
msg: Added a method used in test cases to determine if a file descriptor is
closed. Added troubleshooting code (commented out) to help diagnose
problems around openning and closing files.

author: dmitrys
msg: Make RAMDirectory's touchFile method wait long enough for the system clock
to register a new timestamp. This makes locking logic more robust.
